29#include <libelf.h>
30#include <stdio.h>
31#include <string.h>
32
33#include "_libelf.h"
34
35__RCSID("$NetBSD: elf_errmsg.c,v 1.3 2016/02/20 02:43:42 christos Exp $");
36ELFTC_VCSID("Id: elf_errmsg.c 3174 2015-03-27 17:13:41Z emaste ");
37
38/*
39 * Retrieve a human readable translation for an error message.
40 */
41
42static const char *_libelf_errors[] = {
43#define DEFINE_ERROR(N,S) [ELF_E_##N] = S
44 DEFINE_ERROR(NONE, "No Error"),
45 DEFINE_ERROR(ARCHIVE, "Malformed ar(1) archive"),
46 DEFINE_ERROR(ARGUMENT, "Invalid argument"),
47 DEFINE_ERROR(CLASS, "ELF class mismatch"),
48 DEFINE_ERROR(DATA, "Invalid data buffer descriptor"),
49 DEFINE_ERROR(HEADER, "Missing or malformed ELF header"),
50 DEFINE_ERROR(IO, "I/O error"),
51 DEFINE_ERROR(LAYOUT, "Layout constraint violation"),
52 DEFINE_ERROR(MODE, "Incorrect ELF descriptor mode"),
53 DEFINE_ERROR(RANGE, "Value out of range of target"),
54 DEFINE_ERROR(RESOURCE, "Resource exhaustion"),
55 DEFINE_ERROR(SECTION, "Invalid section descriptor"),
56 DEFINE_ERROR(SEQUENCE, "API calls out of sequence"),
57 DEFINE_ERROR(UNIMPL, "Unimplemented feature"),
58 DEFINE_ERROR(VERSION, "Unknown ELF API version"),
59 DEFINE_ERROR(NUM, "Unknown error")
60#undef DEFINE_ERROR
61};
62
63const char *
64elf_errmsg(int error)
65{
66 int oserr;
67
68 if (error == ELF_E_NONE &&
69 (error = LIBELF_PRIVATE(error)) == 0)
70 return NULL;
71 else if (error == -1)
72 error = LIBELF_PRIVATE(error);
73
74 oserr = error >> LIBELF_OS_ERROR_SHIFT;
75 error &= LIBELF_ELF_ERROR_MASK;
76
77 if (error < ELF_E_NONE || error >= ELF_E_NUM)
78 return _libelf_errors[ELF_E_NUM];
79 if (oserr) {
80 (void) snprintf((char *) LIBELF_PRIVATE(msg),
81 sizeof(LIBELF_PRIVATE(msg)), "%s: %s",
82 _libelf_errors[error], strerror(oserr));
83 return (const char *)&LIBELF_PRIVATE(msg);
84 }
85 return _libelf_errors[error];
86}
